programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby visits a pharmaceutical lab to investigate a murder case, but when armed men storm the facility and hold everyone hostage, she is trapped within the building with no means of communicating with the outside world. Crime drama, starring Pauley Perrette, Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team looks into a raid on a naval base, and Dr Cyril Taft - the surgeon who saved Gibbs' life - experiences the thrill of assisting on an investigation. Assigned to treat Gibbs' suspect, Taft manages to uncover evidence that may prove crucial to solving the case. Meanwhile, DiNozzo pays his old flame Jeanne Benoit a visit as he chases a lead involving doctors in Sudan. Guest starring John Cryer and Scottie Thompson

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A day spent working on a cut-and-dried case leaves the team free to spend some time away from work, and while McGee and Delilah argue over the importance of keeping shop-talk to a minimum, DiNozzo ends up boring his dinner date with crime-solving tales. However, the agents' personal plans are all interrupted as, one-by-one, they realise errors have been made in closing their latest investigation. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: The crime family Jamie infiltrated orders the assassination of Jimmy Riordan, his undercover alias - so Frank puts him under house arrest for protection. Meanwhile, Danny and Jackie investigate the suspicious death of a big-spending investor who sustained serious injuries in a fight

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A couple confront a businessman who is trying to break into their car, only to discover he has been stabbed. Benson and Stabler are forced to go undercover in a modern-day swingers club, posing as a married couple but in reality seeking information about possible suspects. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The body of a girl is discovered outside a church by two children, and investigations lead the team members to believe she was killed by someone known to her. Benson and Stabler soon realise that to find the person responsible they will require the help of psychiatrist Captain Jackson (guest star Jeremy Irons). Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny investigates when the Reagan family's neighbours are found stabbed to death, and identifies their adult children as the chief suspects. Jamie's search for the Blue Templar makes him the target of unwelcome attention, and Frank clashes with the Mayor over proposed cuts to the force's budget. Police drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Jamie finally reveals to his family that he has been investigating the Blue Templar. Frank decides not to tell the police, and leads the rest of the Reagans on a mission to discover the truth about the shadowy organisation - and find out who really killed Joe. Crime drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Becca's new documentary hits a snag when the jazz club she is featuring is targeted by an arsonist. Under closer investigation, Angie and Shade uncover a hidden speakeasy beneath the club, putting Becca in a tricky situation. Meanwhile, things heat up between Zoe and Lochlan

In response, Bishop and McGee go undercover as a married couple to run surveillance on a lieutenant and his wife, who may be connected to the death. Starring Mark Harmon, Emily Wickersham and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A young Navy Seaman is found dead, with his eyes gouged out, after being involved in a car accident. Director Vance makes a rare return to field duty, pairing up with Gibbs to investigate when it becomes clear the killing seems to be connected to the case of Kip Klugman, a former NCIS agent he once locked up for stealing evidence. Starring Mark Harmon and Rocky Carroll

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby visits a pharmaceutical lab to investigate a murder case, but when armed men storm the facility and hold everyone hostage, she is trapped within the building with no means of communicating with the outside world. Crime drama, starring Pauley Perrette, Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Animal rights activists are implicated in the death of an Aids researcher killed by a bite from an infected monkey, and use the ensuing court case to drum up support for their cause. As events unfold, McCoy and Carmichael find themselves debating ethics with lawyers who argue the protection of animal life is a valid defence in a murder case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a Central Park lake during a Puerto Rican Day parade. The victim turns out to be the wife of a powerful billionaire, and pressure is put on the police to find the culprit quickly. Suspicion falls on the business partner of the victim's husband and a witness comes forward to identify him, making everything seem clear cut - but not for long

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A restaurant owner is beaten to death and Briscoe and Green's investigation leads them to a gang of thrill-seeking teenagers who tried to steal from the victim but ended up killing him. The ensuing case leaves McCoy with a dilemma over whether the accused are old enough to face the death penalty

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The Governor of Connecticut's wife is murdered at a Republican Party function and the investigation leads police to uncover a gay love triangle involving her husband. An arrest is soon made, but a key witness is barred from testifying at the trial because he has entered into a civil partnership with the killer

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A notorious radio DJ claims to have survived an attack by two men posing as chauffeurs. Fontana and Green are dubious at first, knowing he has a history of staging bogus assaults on himself, but the discovery that he is having an affair with a mobster's mistress prompts them to investigate further. However, proving the Mafia's involvement depends on a number of unreliable or unavailable witnesses. Dennis Farina and Jesse L Martin star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A jeweller with ties to the Russian Mob is shot dead in the middle of Times Square. It emerges that he had been helping the authorities bring his associates to justice, giving the detectives some obvious suspects. However, another man injured in the gunfire is later identified as one of the two shooters, bringing his accomplice and then the dead man's wife under suspicion

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An American couple are attacked in Iraq, in the very same spot a group of US Special Ops snipers were ambushed six months earlier. Determined to get to the bottom of the case, Gibbs is forced to speak to Aaron Davis, the only survivor of the first assault, who is now struggling through PTSD at the Walter Reed Medical Centre. The 300th episode of the military crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Navy Public Affairs Officer is killed, and when the team takes up the case, both the man's wife and his mistress emerge as potential suspects. Each woman offering a very different take on the chain of events that led to the murder, and the investigators are forced to decide which of the two is telling the truth. Meanwhile, DiNozzo's father comes to the aid of a homeless woman, who makes a surprising claim about his relationship with her. Guest starring Robert Wagner

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony finds himself in a difficult position when his identity is stolen. Worse yet, multiple fraudsters make use of his status as a special agent to blackmail US senators, and as the chain of events begins to spiral out of control, it is left to the real Dinozzo to bring the perpetrators to justice. Naval crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs teams up with his old friend Senior FBI Agent TC Fornell after two British prisoners, including a former spy, escape captivity and flee to the US via a shipping container. Meanwhile, McGee is busy hunting for a new apartment, and is determined to discover how DiNozzo managed to snag his lavish home. Naval crime drama, guest starring Joe Spano

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman accuses her flatmate's brother of rape, but the detectives realise the evidence points to another assailant and are soon talking to a pupil at a nearby school. Novak is brought on board to prosecute the youngster, but finds herself up against a legal heavyweight in the courtroom. Crime drama, guest starring Terrence Howard and Diane Neal

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler try to establish why a baby with no signs of abuse was abandoned outside a gym, and follow a trail of clues that leads them to a nanny who has something to hide. When a series of illicit secrets comes to light, the duo soon have a murder to investigate. Crime drama, guest starring Lori Singer and John Stamos, with Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Frank is asked to publicly downplay the significance of the murder of an event organiser. However, he is caught between duty and his family when he discovers the victim was married to one of Erin's closest friends. Meanwhile, Jamie embarks on his first undercover mission, where he makes an intriguing new acquaintance. Drama, starring Tom Selleck, with guest appearances by Tony Bennett and Carrie Underwood

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny's actions are closely scrutinised by Internal Affairs after he shoots an undercover cop who failed to identify himself - and investigators become concerned about his state of mind on the day of the incident. Police drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Drama centred on New York City police commissioner Frank Reagan, who ensures that he runs his force as tightly as he runs his household - a job made trickier by the fact that three of his children and his father all have ties to the city's legal system. Starring Tom Selleck, Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes and Len Cariou

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert explores the ancient forests of the Isle of Wight, revealing why the island provides the perfect sanctuary for endangered red squirrels to breed and prosper, and how the absence of deer has allowed small mammals to flourish in deciduous woodland. He joins Ian White of the People's Trust for Endangered Species as he goes on his rounds, checking nest boxes designed to preserve the dormouse, and finds out about one of Britain's rarest amphibians - the great crested newt

Meanwhile, Mary is given a crash-course in modern birthing techniques and Kate continues her quest to lose her virginity, setting her sights on an older man she meets at Brendan's football practice. Drama, starring Martin Clunes and Julie Graham

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home

programme.title: Department S
programme.desc: The death of a professional golfer prompts an investigation - and the case is given an added twist by the subsequent theft of his clubs

programme.title: Two Men in a Boat Chasing Spring
programme.desc: Jeremy Norman and his partner Derek Frost charter a motor yacht and set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles

programme.title: Two Men in a Boat Chasing Spring
programme.desc: Jeremy Norman and his partner Derek Frost charter a motor yacht and set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles

programme.title: Mudlarking the Thames
programme.desc: Nicola White takes you to Thameside, Chiswick and Strand on the Green, to explore the wonderful world of Mudlarking, with local historian Liz Anderson

programme.title: Sara Dane
programme.desc: Historical drama about a woman transported to a penal colony in Australia for a crime she did not commit

programme.title: After the Fox (1966)
programme.desc: An Italian conman escapes from prison and adopts the guise of a film director to help him smuggle a fortune in gold - roping in a washed up movie star to complete the deception and recruiting an entire town to be extras in his phoney film shoot. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers, Victor Mature, and Britt Ekland

programme.title: The Best Man (1964)
programme.desc: Presidential candidates resort to smear tactics to have their party nominated at election time. Gore Vidal's political drama, starring Henry Fonda, Cliff Robertson, Margaret Leighton and Shelly Berman

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh tries to win the respect of her fellow traders at the iconic Adelaide Central Market, so she cooks them all a special 'like me' gift

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh joins Andre on a food adventure sourcing some of South Australia's finest produce. Back home, Poh creates two brilliant new recipes - the ultimate beef pie and coffee clairs

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: The pilgrims have to reunite the lands of night and day - a tricky task given that the Queen of Night sucks the blood of the inhabitants of her land, while the King of Day forces his people into slavery. Cult classic following the adventures of Buddhist priest Tripitaka and his three disciples Monkey, Pigsy, and Sandy

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: The couple meet a building inspector who's due to approve work on their new house - but disaster strikes when the top floor begins to collapse, leaving them with just a few seconds to escape. Back home, Mary's professional ethics are put to the test when a couple ask her to induce labour prematurely so they can attend to a business conference in Costa Rica, and William goes all out to rectify a serious insurance problem. Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham and Peter Pacey

programme.title: Cambridge Spies
programme.desc: The quartet exploit their society connections and worm their way into the British establishment, gaining posts at the Foreign Office, BBC and MI5 - but Philby's assignment to assassinate Franco for his KGB masters leads to conflict. As he struggles to deal with the reality of his double life, a political shift leaves all the spies wondering whether their sacrifices were worth it. Toby Stephens and Samuel West star

programme.title: South of the River (2020)
programme.desc: A singer is diagnosed with throat cancer, and must choose between his band and his medical treatment. Drama, starring Alex Gillison and Joe Watkins

programme.title: Dulcima (1971)
programme.desc: A girl treated as a drudge by her family lifts herself from her environment by becoming a housekeeper. Drama, starring John Mills, Carol White and Stuart Wilson
